## isArray() function

Determines whether the input is an array or not.

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function isArray<Input>(input: unknown): input is Array<Input>;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

input


</td><td>

unknown


</td><td>

Generic input.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

input is Array&lt;Input&gt;

true if the input is an array or false otherwise.

## Example


```ts
isArray([{ id: 1 }, { id: 2 }]) // true
isArray(["one", "one"]) // true
isArray([{ id: 1 }, { id: 2 }]) // true
isArray('Is an array?') // false
```
